text: The Southern Peninsula () is a region in the southwest of the Iceland. The region is located on the Reykjanes Peninsula (). The population of the region was 27,829 (2020). The capital in the region is Keflavík, with a population of 15,930 (2018). Keflavík International Airport, which is the largest and busiest airport in Iceland, is located in the region. == Related pages == * Regions of Iceland
title: Southern Peninsula (Iceland)
